remarks: The base set of a restricted polynomial algebra consists of power series in the subring which are also polynomials (in the parent ring).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)
statement:
ressmpl.s $e |- S = ( I mPoly R ) $.
ressmpl.h $e |- H = ( R |`s T ) $.
ressmpl.u $e |- U = ( I mPoly H ) $.
ressmpl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` U ) $.
ressmpl.1 $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
ressmpl.2 $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) $.
ressmplbas2.w $e |- W = ( I mPwSer H ) $.
ressmplbas2.c $e |- C = ( Base ` W ) $.
ressmplbas2.k $e |- K = ( Base ` S ) $.
ressmplbas2 $p |- ( ph -> B = ( C i^i K ) ) $.
